…slightly over 780,000 constituents. Out of those  780,000 constituents, 524,000 of them are Medicaid recipients, and over  100,000 of them are Medicare recipients, so over 600,000 of the 780,000  constituents who I represent receive either Medicaid or Medicare. In  addition to that, there are 263,000 households that receive food  stamps.
